column4: hey... is there an application in the repos that can remove audio from a video?
any of the dvd rippers can strip the audio into a seperate file
it's a home made video though
yahoo has a pop3 service, as does hotmail, but I think you have to pay for hotmail
so that means it's not possible?
no, evolution will work with pop3 accounts, but you have to pay hotmail/yahoo to enable pop3 access for your account
i see... thanks... i better read on different types of email accounts then... would you care to give me a quick description of them?
quote then "hel lo" or escape chars hel\ lo
better to quote the whole line
why don't you just "mv" like everyone else or use the gui
i'm trying to re-organize the old photos i wasn't able to save with a proper file name to represent it's album... so i want to have trip to philippines 001, tripxxx 002... etc...
that wasn't so clear... lol... i want to have a progressive number attached to the new file name of a lot of files... like hundreds...
I don't know how gwenranme wants input
